module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *2.10.0.0* bump to final, tooltip updates *2.10.0rc1.7* #5627, #5628 *2.10.0rc1.6* #5619 again, typo *2.10.0rc1.5* amportal chown corrections from last checkin *2.10.0rc1.4* #5619, #5615, some amportal chown tuning *2.10.0rc1.3* #5528, #5391, #5260, #5148, colapsible gui eleent sections *2.10.0rc1.2* #5585 SECURITY ISSUE introduced in 2.10.0rc1.2 previous version *2.10.0rc1.1* #4909, #5117, #5545, #5565 menu/CSS fixes, default language improvements *2.10.0rc1.0* add backup repo, misc, bump release candidate *2.10.0beta3.6* #5513 and one more syntax issue *2.10.0beta3.5* #5513 check for setting first *2.10.0beta3.4* #5513, better zend detecetion, cdr migration bug check *2.10.0beta3.3* add some error checking on migration script *2.10.0beta3.2* migrates cdr table adding did field *2.10.0beta3.1* migrates cdr table adding recordingfile field *2.10.0beta3.0* beta3 bump, misc tweaks *2.10.0beta2.8* #5465, #5475, #5476, #5480, adds .htaccess to address some potential security vulnerabilities *2.10.0beta2.7* #5465 *2.10.0beta2.6* #5342, #5461, #5451, #5463, #5442, gui changes, manager library enhancements, *2.10.0beta2.5* version bump, see trac for more info *2.10.0beta2.4* #5122, #5443, #5451, #5450 *2.10.0beta2.3* revert r12651 *2.10.0beta2.2* module admin depency check changes *2.10.0beta2.1* migration script bug fix *2.10.0beta2.0* move FOP to module, add hook ability to freepbx_engine (amportal), remove gzip handling preventing caching, various bug fixes *2.10.0beta1.1* #5375, #5341, #5375, #5390, more on $5342, adds back freepbx_menu.conf to customize menu bar and content *2.10.0beta1.0* beta1 release, see svn log *2.9.0.7* #5209, #5217, #5221, #5212, #5211, #5140, #5216 *2.9.0.6* #5194 *2.9.0.5* #5183 *2.9.0.4* #5138 *2.9.0.3* #5160 *2.9.0.2* #5122 *2.9.0.1* #5027 *2.9.0.0* #5124 *2.9.0rc1.5* #5077, #5086, #5096, #5095, #5111 *2.9.0rc1.4* #5080 *2.9.0rc1.3* #5038, #5059 *2.9.0rc1.2* #5041, #4871, #5053, *2.9.0rc1.1* #5009, #5028, #5035, typos *2.9.0rc1.0* #4983, #4952, #5000, #4988
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
